entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 19. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
